    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Novica - Slon je pobegnil</string>
            <string language="en">News - The Elephant has escaped</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachrichten - der Elefant ist entgangen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelles - l'éléphant s'est échappé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia - o elefante escapou-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie - l'elefante ha fuoriuscito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδήσεις - ο ελέφαντας έχει δραπετεύσει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noticias - el elefante se ha escapado</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec prebere besedilo o slonu in reši slončkov kviz.</string>
            <string language="en">Short story about the elephant and set of quiz type questions to test reading comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slon</string>
            <string language="en">elephant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">novica</string>
            <string language="en">news</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kviz</string>
            <string language="en">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bralno razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Geschichte über den Elefanten und Set des 
Quiz schreiben Fragen zum Testleseerfassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire courte au sujet de l'éléphant et 
l'ensemble de jeu tapent des questions à la compréhension de lecture
d'essai.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A história curta sobre o elefante e o jogo do 
quiz datilografam perguntas à compreensão da leitura do teste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia corta circa l'elefante e l'insieme del 
quiz digitano le domande alla comprensione della lettura della prova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη ιστορία για τον ελέφαντα και το σύνολο 
ερωτήσεων τύπων διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων για να εξετάσει την 
κατανόηση ανάγνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia corta sobre el elefante y el conjunto
del concurso pulsan preguntas a la comprensión de la lectura de la 
prueba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elefant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachrichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz</string>
          </keyword>
